com.rshepard.tictactoe

Class TicTacToeEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rshepard.tictactoe.TicTacToeEngine

  • public class TicTacToeEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    TicTacToeEngine creates the players, UI, and handles the logic for a game of tic tac toe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToeEngine()
      Constructor creates a new TicTacToeEngine instance and initializes the GUI and sets the default turn count to zero and isGameOver to false.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkWin(com.rshepard.tictactoe.Mark mark)
      Checks for a win for the given mark on the Tic Tac Toe board and returns a boolean indicating if a win was found
      static com.rshepard.tictactoe.Player getPlayer()
      Get player returns the object containing the current player.
      static boolean isGameOver()
      Used by the UI class to disable event listeners if the game is over.
      void play()
      Creates a game loop that continues until a player wins or all the board spaces have been filled.
      static void setPlayer(com.rshepard.tictactoe.Player player)
      Resets the current player field after a player has taken their turn by an action generated in the UI class.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToeEngine

        public TicTacToeEngine()
        Constructor creates a new TicTacToeEngine instance and initializes the GUI and sets the default turn count to zero and isGameOver to false.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Creates a game loop that continues until a player wins or all the board spaces have been filled.

      • getPlayer

        public static com.rshepard.tictactoe.Player getPlayer()
        Get player returns the object containing the current player. I made this method static so that it could be utilize in the TicTacToeUI class without creating an instance of the engine within that class
        Returns:
        Returns the current player

      • setPlayer

        public static void setPlayer(com.rshepard.tictactoe.Player player)
        Resets the current player field after a player has taken their turn by an action generated in the UI class. I made this method static so that it could be utilize in the TicTacToeUI class without creating an instance of the engine within that class
        Parameters:
        player - Sets the player field to the current player

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin(com.rshepard.tictactoe.Mark mark)
        Checks for a win for the given mark on the Tic Tac Toe board and returns a boolean indicating if a win was found
        Parameters:
        mark - The current mark to check for win
        Returns:
        Returns the value of true if the given mark has won on the board. False if not.

      • isGameOver

        public static boolean isGameOver()
        Used by the UI class to disable event listeners if the game is over. I made this method static so that it could be utilize in the TicTacToeUI class without creating an instance of the engine within that class
        Returns:
        the isGameOver
